pageContext.claim: “‘The Obama people did something that’s never been done...They spied on a rival presidential campaign. Would it be OK if Trump did it next? I am losing faith that our system is on the level. I’m beginning to think it is rotten & corrupt. Scary stuff Obama did.’ @TuckerCarlson  DOJ”
pageContext.analysis: The FBI began to investigate some Trump campaign advisers based on national security concerns, namely that Russia was attempting to interfere in the 2016 election. Investigative warrants were duly authorized by judges. Trump suggests these criminal investigations were out of bounds, but there's no evidence that the investigations were tainted by corruption and in fact several Trump campaign advisers have pleaded guilty. Trump has previously claimed that Obama wiretapped his phones at Trump Tower, but there's no evidence of that, either.
